title: Mechdyne Presents: Why Your KPIs Don't Matter, but Ours Do
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/11/2015 @ 10:07 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Mechdyne 
MARSHALLTOWN, Iowa, Sept. 11, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Ticket resolution, response times, and other traditional KPIs used to track AV and IT managed service performance do not accurately measure your program's success. By focusing on the user first and the technology second, you can increase equipment usage, user satisfaction, and your ROI. 
Mechdyne, a firm believer in putting the user first and focusing on equipment second, invites you to attend the upcoming "Why Your KPIs Don't Matter, but Ours Do" webinar on September 16 at 11 am Central. Learn how to best measure your program's effectiveness and success based on relentless attention to end-user satisfaction from Matthew McKaig, Mechdyne's Manager of Global Technical Services. Webinar topics will include: -- The difference between traditional KPIs and customer-focused KPIs -- How to deploy a customer-first managed services program -- Case studies from many education and oil and gas clients 
A question and answer session at the conclusion of the webinar will address your questions about optimizing customer satisfaction and maximizing ROI. 
For more information and to register for the webinar, visit: http://pages.mechdyne.com/MSWebinar91615mj_02-LPMSWebinar.html
